sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Header } from '../../sections/Header/Header' import { Footer } from '../../sections/Footer/Footer' import './WorkshopsPage.css' import Axios from "axios" import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import ImageSl from '../../components/Slide/Slide' export const WorkshopsPage = () => { // useState to make API data extraction synchronous const [workshops, setworkshop] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { // call the API by Axios to display workshops in the collection workshops in the PFA DB here Axios.get("http://localhost:5000/workshops") .then(res => { setworkshop(res.data) }) }, []) return (

Uncover the available workshops and their schedules !

  • Find the workshops that suit your interests.
  • Click the button below to access additional information and to register.
/*
*/ {workshops.map(workshop => { return(
{workshop.workshopName}

Date : {workshop.workshopDate}

Room : {workshop.room}

Start hour : {workshop.startHour}

Formateur first name : {workshop.formateurFirstName}

Formateur last name : {workshop.formateurLastName}

) })}
) }
